column3: You cannot view your client lists in your agent services account. You can use your account to view and manage an individual client's VAT details.
column5: Ni allwch fwrw golwg dros eich rhestrau o gleientiaid drwy’ch cyfrif gwasanaethau asiant. Gallwch ddefnyddio’ch cyfrif i fwrw golwg dros fanylion TAW  cleient unigol a’u rheoli.

column3: Making Tax Digital for VAT
column5: Troi Treth yn Ddigidol ar gyfer TAW

column3: Sign clients up for Making Tax Digital for VAT
column5: Cofrestru cleientiaid ar gyfer y cynllun Troi Treth yn Ddigidol ar gyfer TAW

column3: You copied across existing client authorisations to your agent services account. This means you can now sign these clients up to Making Tax Digital.
column5: Rydych wedi copïo awdurdodiadau cleientiaid presennol ar draws i’ch cyfrif gwasanaethau asiant. Mae hyn yn golygu y gallwch nawr gofrestru’r cleientiaid hyn ar gyfer Troi Treth yn Ddigidol.

column3: Sign clients up for Making Tax Digital for VAT (opens in a new window or tab)
column5: Cofrestru cleientiaid ar gyfer Troi Treth yn Ddigidol ar gyfer TAW (yn agor ffenestr neu dab newydd)

column3: Manage your client''s VAT details
column5: Rheoli manylion TAW eich cleient

column3: Use this service to update your client's VAT registration status, business name (if they are a limited company), principal place of business and VAT stagger.
column5: Defnyddiwch y gwasanaeth hwn i ddiweddaru statws cofrestru TAW, enw busnes (os yw’n gwmni cyfyngedig), prif leoliad busnes a chyfnodau TAW eich cleient.

column3: Manage your client''s VAT details (opens in a new window or tab)
column5: Rheoli manylion TAW eich cleient (yn agor ffenestr neu dab newydd)

column3: View a client''s PAYE income record
column5: Bwrw golwg dros gofnod incwm TWE cleient

column3: Access a client''s PAYE income record to help you complete their Self Assessment tax return.
column5: Cael mynediad at gofnod incwm TWE cleient i’ch helpu i lenwi ei Ffurflen Dreth Hunanasesiad.

column3: View a client''s PAYE income record
column5: Bwrw golwg dros gofnod incwm TWE cleient

column3: We have temporarily limited your use of this service
column5: Rydym wedi cyfyngu ar eich defnydd o’r gwasanaeth hwn dros dro

column3: We did this because we have suspended your agent code. We sent you a letter to confirm this.
column5: Gwnaethom hyn oherwydd ein bod wedi gohirio eich cod asiant. Rydym wedi anfon llythyr atoch yn cadarnhau hyn.

column3: This means you will not be able to use this service to ask for authorisation to {0}.
column5: Mae hyn yn golygu na fyddwch yn gallu defnyddio’r gwasanaeth hwn i ofyn am awdurdodiad er mwyn {0}.

column3: This means you will not be able to use this service to ask clients for authorisation to:
column5: Mae hyn yn golygu na fyddwch yn gallu defnyddio’r gwasanaeth hwn i ofyn i gleientiaid am awdurdodiad i wneud y canlynol:

column3: send a client''s Income Tax updates through software
column5: anfon diweddariadau Treth Incwm cleient drwy feddalwedd

column3: send their Income Tax updates through software
column5: anfon eu diweddariadau Treth Incwm drwy feddalwedd

column3: view a client''s PAYE income record
column5: bwrw golwg dros gofnod incwm TWE cleient

column3: view their PAYE income record
column5: bwrw golwg dros eu cofnod incwm TWE

column3: submit a client''s VAT returns through software
column5: cyflwyno Ffurflenni TAW cleient drwy feddalwedd

column3: submit their VAT returns through software
column5: cyflwyno eu Ffurflenni TAW drwy feddalwedd

column5: cynnal ymddiriedolaeth neu ystâd

column3: maintain a trust or an estate
column5: cynnal ymddiriedolaeth neu ystâd

column3: manage their Capital Gains Tax on UK property disposals
column5: rheoli eu Treth Enillion Cyfalaf ar warediadau eiddo yn y DU

column3: You can still access any other service available to you.
column5: Gallwch barhau i gael mynediad at unrhyw wasanaeth arall sydd ar gael i chi.

column3: If you did not receive our letter, or think we have made a mistake, use the ''get help with this page'' link.
column5: Os na chawsoch ein llythyr, neu os ydych yn meddwl ein bod wedi gwneud camgymeriad, defnyddiwch y cysylltiad “cael help gyda’r dudalen hon”.

column5: Yn eich blaen

column5: Mae’n ddrwg gennym, rydym yn profi anawsterau technegol

column5: Rhowch gynnig arall arni mewn ychydig o funudau.

column3: Accessibility statement for agent services account
column5: Datganiad hygyrchedd ar gyfer cyfrif gwasanaethau asiant

column3: Accessibility statement for agent services account
column5: Datganiad hygyrchedd ar gyfer cyfrif gwasanaethau asiant

column3: This accessibility statement explains how accessible this service is, what to do if you have difficulty using it, and how to report accessibility problems with the service.
column5: Mae’r datganiad hygyrchedd hwn yn esbonio pa mor hygyrch yw’r gwasanaeth hwn, beth i’w wneud os ydych yn cael anhawster wrth ei ddefnyddio, a sut i roi gwybod am broblemau hygyrchedd gyda’r gwasanaeth.

column3: This service is part of the wider GOV.UK website. There is a separate accessibility statement for the main GOV.UK website.
column5: Mae’r gwasanaeth hwn yn rhan o wefan ehangach GOV.UK. Mae datganiad hygyrchedd ar wahân ar gyfer prif wefan GOV.UK.

column3: This page only contains information about the agent services account service, available at www.tax.service.gov.uk/agent-subscription/task-list.
column5: Mae’r dudalen hon yn cynnwys gwybodaeth am y gwasanaeth cyfrif gwasanaethau asiant yn unig, sydd ar gael yn www.tax.service.gov.uk/agent-subscription/task-list.

column3: Using this service
column5: Defnyddio’r gwasanaeth hwn

column3: This service enables you to manage your HMRC agent services account for your tax agent firm.
column5: Mae’r gwasanaeth hwn yn eich galluogi i reoli’ch cyfrif gwasanaethau asiant CThEM ar gyfer eich cwmni asiant treth.

column3: This service is run by HM Revenue and Customs (HMRC). We want as many people as possible to be able to use this service. This means you should be able to:
column5: Mae’r gwasanaeth hwn yn cael ei redeg gan Gyllid a Thollau EM (CThEM). Rydym am i gymaint o bobl â phosibl allu defnyddio’r gwasanaeth hwn. Mae hyn yn golygu y dylech allu gwneud y canlynol:

column3: change colours, contrast levels and fonts
column5: newid lliwiau, lefelau cyferbyniad a ffontiau

column3: zoom in up to 300% without the text spilling off the screen
column5: chwyddo’r sgrin hyd at 300% heb i’r testun ddisgyn oddi ar y sgrin

column3: get from the start of the service to the end using just a keyboard
column5: mynd o ddechrau’r gwasanaeth i’r diwedd gan ddefnyddio bysellfwrdd yn unig

column3: get from the start of the service to the end using speech recognition software
column5: mynd o ddechrau’r gwasanaeth i’r diwedd gan ddefnyddio meddalwedd adnabod lleferydd

column3: listen to the service using a screen reader (including the most recent versions of JAWS, NVDA and VoiceOver)
column5: gwrando ar y gwasanaeth gan ddefnyddio darllenydd sgrin (gan gynnwys y fersiynau diweddaraf o JAWS, NVDA a VoiceOver)

column3: We have also made the text in the service as simple as possible to understand.
column5: Rydym hefyd wedi sicrhau bod y testun a ddefnyddir yn y gwasanaeth mor syml â phosibl i’w ddeall.

column3: AbilityNet has advice on making your device easier to use if you have a disability.
column5: Mae gan AbilityNet gyngor ar wneud eich dyfais yn haws i’w defnyddio os oes gennych anabledd.

column3: How accessible this service is
column5: Pa mor hygyrch yw’r gwasanaeth hwn

column3: This service is partially compliant with the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines version 2.1 AA standard.
column5: Mae’r gwasanaeth hwn yn cydymffurfio’n rhannol â safon AA Canllawiau Hygyrchedd Cynnwys y We, fersiwn 2.1.

column3: What to do if you have difficulty using this service
column5: Beth i’w wneud os ydych yn cael anhawster wrth ddefnyddio’r gwasanaeth hwn

column3: If you have difficulty using this service, use the 'Get help with this page' link on the page in the online service.
column5: Os ydych yn cael anhawster wrth ddefnyddio’r gwasanaeth hwn, defnyddiwch y cysylltiad ‘Help gyda’r dudalen hon’ ar y dudalen yn y gwasanaeth ar-lein.

column3: Reporting accessibility problems with this service
column5: Rhoi gwybod am broblemau hygyrchedd gyda’r gwasanaeth hwn

column3: We are always looking to improve the accessibility of this service. If you find any problems that are not listed on this page or think we are not meeting accessibility requirements, report the accessibility problem (opens in new window or tab).
column5: Rydym bob amser yn ceisio gwella hygyrchedd y gwasanaeth hwn. Os byddwch yn dod o hyd i unrhyw broblemau nad ydynt wedi’u rhestru ar y dudalen hon, neu os ydych o’r farn nad ydym yn bodloni gofynion hygyrchedd, rhowch wybod am y broblem hygyrchedd (yn agor ffenestr neu dab newydd).

column3: What to do if you are not happy with how we respond to your complaint
column5: Beth i’w wneud os nad ydych yn hapus â sut rydym yn ateb eich cwyn

column3: The Equality and Human Rights Commission (EHRC) is responsible for enforcing the Public Sector Bodies (Websites and Mobile Applications) (No. 2) Accessibility Regulations 2018 (the 'accessibility regulations'). If you are not happy with how we respond to your complaint, contact the Equality Advisory and Support Service (EASS), or the Equality Commission for Northern Ireland (ECNI) if you live in Northern Ireland.
column5: Mae’r Comisiwn Cydraddoldeb a Hawliau Dynol (EHRC) yn gyfrifol am orfodi Rheoliadau Hygyrchedd Cyrff Sector Cyhoeddus (Gwefannau a Chymwysiadau Symudol) (Rhif 2) 2018 (y ‘rheoliadau hygyrchedd’). Os nad ydych yn hapus â sut rydym yn ateb eich cwyn, cysylltwch â’r Gwasanaeth Cynghori a Chymorth Cydraddoldeb (EASS), neu’r Equality Commission for Northern Ireland (ECNI) os ydych yn byw yng Ngogledd Iwerddon.

column3: Contacting us by phone or getting a visit from us in person
column5: Cysylltu â ni dros y ffôn neu gael ymweliad personol gennym

column3: We provide a text relay service if you are deaf, hearing impaired or have a speech impediment.
column5: Rydym yn cynnig gwasanaeth text relay os ydych yn fyddar, â nam ar eich clyw neu os oes gennych nam ar eich lleferydd.

column3: We can provide a British Sign Language (BSL) interpreter, or you can arrange a visit from an HMRC advisor to help you complete the service.
column5: Gallwn ddarparu dehonglydd Iaith Arwyddion Prydain (BSL), neu gallwch drefnu ymweliad gan ymgynghorydd CThEM i’ch helpu i gwblhau’r gwasanaeth.

column3: Find out how to contact us.
column5: Gwybodaeth am sut i gysylltu â ni.

column3: Technical information about this service's accessibility
column5: Gwybodaeth dechnegol am hygyrchedd y gwasanaeth hwn

column3: HMRC is committed to making this service accessible, in accordance with the Public Sector Bodies (Websites and Mobile Applications) (No. 2) Accessibility Regulations 2018.
column5: Mae CThEM wedi ymrwymo i wneud y gwasanaeth hwn yn hygyrch, yn unol â Rheoliadau Hygyrchedd Cyrff Sector Cyhoeddus (Gwefannau a Chymwysiadau Symudol) (Rhif 2) 2018.

column3: This service is partially compliant with the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines version 2.1 AA standard.
column5: Mae’r gwasanaeth hwn yn cydymffurfio’n rhannol â safon AA Canllawiau Hygyrchedd Cynnwys y We, fersiwn 2.1.

column3: We have carried out an in-house expert review of the service and fixed all known accessibility issues.
column5: Rydym wedi cynnal adolygiad arbenigol mewnol o’r gwasanaeth ac wedi trwsio pob mater hysbys o ran hygyrchedd.

column3: We will arrange a formal external audit of the full service as soon as possible, as part of our roadmap for making sure the service is fully compliant.
column5: Byddwn yn trefnu archwiliad allanol ffurfiol o’r gwasanaeth cyfan cyn gynted â phosibl, fel rhan o’n cynllun ar gyfer sicrhau bod y gwasanaeth yn cydymffurfio’n llawn.

column3: How we tested this service
column5: Sut gwnaethom brofi’r gwasanaeth hwn

column3: The service was last tested on 22 August 2019 and was checked for compliance with WCAG 2.1 AA.
column5: Cafodd y gwasanaeth ei brofi ddiwethaf ar 22 Awst 2019 a gwiriwyd ei fod yn cydymffurfio â safon AA Canllawiau Hygyrchedd Cynnwys y We, fersiwn 2.1.

column3: The full service was tested by HMRC and included disabled users.
column5: Profwyd y gwasanaeth llawn gan CThEM, ac roedd y gwaith o brofi’r gwasanaeth yn cynnwys defnyddwyr anabl.

column3: This page was prepared on 23 September 2019. It was last updated on 23 September 2019.
column5: Paratowyd y dudalen hon ar 23 Medi 2019. Cafodd ei diweddaru ddiwethaf ar 23 Medi 2019.

column5: Mewngofnodwch eto i ddefnyddio’r gwasanaeth hwn.

column5: Nodwch ddyddiad cofrestru TAW go iawn

column3: VAT registration date must include a valid day
column5: Rhaid i’r dyddiad cofrestru TAW gynnwys diwrnod dilys

column3: VAT registration date must include a day and month
column5: Rhaid i’r dyddiad cofrestru TAW gynnwys diwrnod a mis

column3: VAT registration date must include a day and year
column5: Rhaid i’r dyddiad cofrestru TAW gynnwys diwrnod a blwyddyn

column3: VAT registration date must include a valid month
column5: Rhaid i’r dyddiad cofrestru TAW gynnwys mis dilys

column3: VAT registration date must include a valid year
column5: Rhaid i’r dyddiad cofrestru TAW gynnwys blwyddyn ddilys

column3: VAT registration date must include a month and year
column5: Rhaid i’r dyddiad cofrestru TAW gynnwys mis a blwyddyn

column3: VAT registration date must be in the past
column5: Rhaid i’r dyddiad cofrestru TAW fod yn y gorffennol

column3: VAT registration date must be later than 1 January 1900
column5: Rhaid i’r dyddiad cofrestru TAW fod yn hwyrach nag 1 Ionawr 1900

column3: Enter your business details
column5: Nodwch fanylion eich busnes

column3: This will help us match your details against information we currently hold.
column5: Bydd hyn yn ein helpu i baru’ch manylion â’r wybodaeth sydd gennym ar hyn o bryd.

column3: Enter the last 10 digits only. For example, 12345 67890
column5: Nodwch y 10 digid olaf yn unig. Er enghraifft, 12345 67890

column3: Your Self Assessment Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR)
column5: Eich Cyfeirnod Unigryw y Trethdalwr (UTR) ar gyfer Hunanasesiad

column3: Corporation Tax or company Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR)
column5: Cyfeirnod Unigryw y Trethdalwr (UTR) ar gyfer Treth Gorfforaeth neu ar gyfer y cwmni

column3: Partnership Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR)
column5: Cyfeirnod Unigryw y Trethdalwr (UTR) y Bartneriaeth

column3: Partnership Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR)
column5: Cyfeirnod Unigryw y Trethdalwr (UTR) y Bartneriaeth

column3: Where to find your Self Assessment UTR
column5: Ble i ddod o hyd i’ch UTR Hunanasesiad

column3: You'll find your UTR (opens in a new window or tab) on the letter HMRC sent you when you registered for Self Assessment. It's a 10-digit number, sometimes with a letter ''K'' on the end.
column5: Gallwch ddod o hyd i’ch UTR (yn agor ffenestr neu dab newydd) ar y llythyr a anfonodd CThEM atoch pan wnaethoch gofrestru ar gyfer Hunanasesiad. Mae’n rhif 10 digid o hyd, ac sydd â’r llythyren “K” ar y diwedd weithiau.

column3: Where to find your Corporation Tax or company UTR
column5: Ble i ddod o hyd i’ch UTR Treth Gorfforaeth neu UTR eich cwmni

column3: You can usually find your Corporation Tax or company UTR in the header of letters from HM Revenue & Customs (HMRC), next to headings such as 'Tax Reference', 'UTR' or 'Official Use'.
column5: Fel rheol, gallwch ddod o hyd i’ch UTR Treth Gorfforaeth neu UTR eich cwmni ym mhennawd llythyrau gan Gyllid a Thollau EM (CThEM), wrth ymyl penawdau megis ‘Cyfeirnod Treth’, ‘UTR’ neu ‘Defnydd Swyddogol’.

column3: Where to find your partnership UTR
column5: Ble i ddod o hyd i UTR eich partneriaeth

column3: You can find your partnership UTR in the header of letters from HM Revenue & Customs (HMRC), next to headings such as 'Tax Reference', 'UTR' or 'Official Use'.
column5: Gallwch ddod o hyd i UTR eich partneriaeth ym mhennawd llythyrau gan Gyllid a Thollau EM (CThEM), wrth ymyl penawdau megis ‘Cyfeirnod Treth’, ‘UTR’ neu ‘Defnydd Swyddogol’.

column3: Where to find your partnership UTR
column5: Ble i ddod o hyd i UTR eich partneriaeth

column3: You can find your partnership UTR in the header of letters from HM Revenue & Customs (HMRC), next to headings such as 'Tax Reference', 'UTR' or 'Official Use'.
column5: Gallwch ddod o hyd i UTR eich partneriaeth ym mhennawd llythyrau gan Gyllid a Thollau EM (CThEM), wrth ymyl penawdau megis ‘Cyfeirnod Treth’, ‘UTR’ neu ‘Defnydd Swyddogol’.

column3: Registered business postcode
column5: Cod post y busnes cofrestredig

column3: This is the postcode of your registered business address
column5: Dyma god post cyfeiriad cofrestredig eich busnes

column3: You can create an agent services account
column5: Gallwch greu cyfrif gwasanaethau asiant

column3: We've checked {0} and it doesn't have an agent services account.
column5: Rydym wedi gwirio {0} ac nid oes ganddo gyfrif gwasanaethau asiant.

column3: Invalid address
column5: Cyfeiriad annilys

column3: Sorry, the address is not in a format that our system can accept. Please change the address to fix the problems described below:
column5: Mae’n ddrwg gennym, nid yw’r cyfeiriad mewn fformat y gall ein system ei dderbyn. Newidiwch y cyfeiriad i ddatrys y problemau a ddisgrifir isod:

column3: Change address
column5: Newid cyfeiriad

column3: Create a new Government Gateway user ID
column5: Creu Dynodydd Defnyddiwr (ID) newydd ar gyfer Porth y Llywodraeth

column3: You will need this user ID to sign in to your new agent services account.
column5: Bydd angen y Dynodydd Defnyddiwr (ID) hwn i fewngofnodi i’ch cyfrif gwasanaethau asiant newydd.

column3: You have not signed in with an agent user ID
column5: Nid ydych wedi mewngofnodi gyda Dynodydd Defnyddiwr (ID) asiant

column3: Sign in with an agent Government Gateway user ID to continue.
column5: Mewngofnodwch gyda Dynodydd Defnyddiwr (ID) asiant ar gyfer Porth y Llywodraeth i fynd yn eich blaen.

column3: If you do not have one, create a new user ID, selecting the 'Agent' option.
column5: Os nad oes gennych un, ewch ati i greu Dynodydd Defnyddiwr (ID) newydd, gan ddewis yr opsiwn ‘Asiant’.

column3: Link your clients to your agent services account
column5: Cysylltu’ch cleientiaid â’ch cyfrif gwasanaethau asiant

column3: We will automatically link your current Self Assessment and VAT clients to your agent services account.
column5: Byddwn yn cysylltu’ch cleientiaid Hunanasesiad a TAW presennol â’ch cyfrif gwasanaethau asiant yn awtomatig.

column3: If you prefer, you can skip this step for now. You can do it later after creating your account, but you can save time by doing it now.
column5: Os yw’n well gennych, gallwch hepgor y cam hwn am y tro. Gallwch ei wneud yn nes ymlaen ar ôl creu eich cyfrif, ond gallwch arbed amser drwy ei wneud nawr.

column3: More details about linking your clients
column5: Rhagor o fanylion am gysylltu’ch cleientiaid

column3: You can allow your agent services account to access your current client relationships.
column5: Gallwch ganiatáu i’ch cyfrif gwasanaethau asiant gael mynediad at eich perthnasoedd presennol â chleientiaid.

column3: To do this, we will check for any Self Assessment or VAT client relationships associated with the Government Gateway agent account you used to sign in.
column5: I wneud hyn, byddwn yn gwirio am unrhyw berthnasoedd cleientiaid o ran Hunanasesiad neu TAW sy’n gysylltiedig â’r cyfrif asiant Porth y Llywodraeth a ddefnyddioch i fewngofnodi.

column3: You should use this service if you expect to provide any of the following services for clients:
column5: Dylech ddefnyddio’r gwasanaeth hwn os ydych yn disgwyl darparu unrhyw rai o’r gwasanaethau canlynol ar gyfer cleientiaid:

column3: report their income and expenses through software
column5: adrodd am eu hincwm a’u treuliau drwy feddalwedd

column3: report their VAT returns through software
column5: adrodd am eu Ffurflenni TAW drwy feddalwedd

column3: If you choose to link your clients, anyone using this agent services account may be able to access your client relationships.
column5: Os dewiswch gysylltu’ch cleientiaid, efallai y gall unrhyw un sy’n defnyddio’r cyfrif gwasanaethau asiant hwn gael mynediad at eich perthnasoedd cleient.

column3: Do you want to link your clients now?
column5: A hoffech gysylltu’ch cleientiaid nawr?

column3: Yes
column5: Iawn

column3: No
column5: Na

column3: Select yes if you want to link your clients now
column5: Dewiswch ‘Iawn’ os hoffech gysylltu’ch cleientiaid nawr

column3: Agent services account created
column5: Cyfrif gwasanaethau asiant wedi’i greu

column3: Agent services account created
column5: Cyfrif gwasanaethau asiant wedi’i greu

column3: You created an account for
column5: Rydych wedi creu cyfrif ar gyfer

column3: What you can do next
column5: Yr hyn y gallwch ei wneud nesaf

column3: Make a note of your account reference number {0}. You will need this to contact HMRC if you cannot access your agent services account.
column5: Gwnewch nodyn o gyfeirnod eich cyfrif {0}. Bydd angen hwn arnoch i gysylltu â CThEM os na allwch gael mynediad at eich cyfrif gwasanaethau asiant.

column3: We have sent an email to {0} confirming these details.
column5: Rydym wedi anfon e-bost i {0} i gadarnhau’r manylion hyn.

column3: Check the guidance to find out how to:
column5: Gwiriwch yr arweiniad i gael gwybod sut i wneud y canlynol:

column3: sign in to your agent services account
column5: mewngofnodi i’ch cyfrif gwasanaethau asiant

column3: use new HMRC services on behalf of your clients
column5: defnyddio gwasanaethau CThEM newydd ar ran eich cleientiaid

column3: Go to your agent services account
column5: Ewch i’ch cyfrif gwasanaethau asiant

column3: Go to your agent services account
column5: Ewch i’ch cyfrif gwasanaethau asiant

column3: Continue
column5: Yn eich blaen
